Name: UNSTABLE
About the game: Handle the unique manual controls in the 3D action runner with spaceship flight simulation to continue your adventure and get more messages from the unknown. Avoid asteroids or fracture them with a plasma laser weapon! Beat Leaderboard! Battle the boss! And enjoy the chaos! Unique Keyboard Controls Are designed to simulate the chaos of controlling a spaceship. Each of the 4 colored zones is responsible for movement in a certain direction. Press different buttons in the colored zone to increase movement in a defined (shown by yellow arrows) direction. Endless Mode The space is enormous - fly as long as you can and meet various gorgeous spacescapes along your way. Leaderboard Try your best on your way to the best pilots! Immersive Main Menu Look around and interact directly with screens, gauges, and other equipment of the spaceship cockpit. Campaign This story begins with an unexpected encounter... An unknown messages you. Who is he and what are his motives? That's for you to decide. Plasma Laser Weapon To destroy the obstacles on your way to... The Boss A real challenge of your skill. Energetic Music At each level, you will be accompanied by a new vigorous soundtrack :3 Originally created in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with the theme 'Let There Be Chaos'. This version includes more content, visual improvements, and optimizations.
